casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Billy Ray GRAHAM, Sr. No. COA15-1155. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. June 21, 2016.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

12 CRS 98010, 12 CRS 98011: Petition for writ of certiorari allowed; Judgments Affirmed. 14 CRS 68910: Affirmed in part; Dismissed without prejudice in part.
